fields.text: Kills, Deaths and Charm Weights
- Kills, Deaths and Weight will affect these stats:
Kill and Death Modifiers:
- Grants +1 Max HP% for every 10,000 kills (No Max)
- Grants +1 Spell, Combat and Summoning Power for every 500,000 kills (Max +10)
- Grants +1 All Skills for every 1,000,000 kills (No Max)
- Penalizes -1% Max HP for every death (Max -20%)
Charm Weight Modifiers:
- Start with +80% Mana Regen, then penalized -1% for every weight used
- Start with +40% Faster Run/Walk, then penalized -1% for every weight used
- Start with +3 All Skills, then penalized as follows:
- Penalized -1% Damage Reduction for every +4 weight used
- Exceeding maximum charm weight reduces mana to 0
Major Changes
- Enabled socketing for the following item types:
- Many new stats, oskills and new mechanics added
- Hundreds of New Unique items added
- 28 New Sets with 72 more set items added
- 42 New Runewords added
- Runewords can be made with any socket count using jewels to fill extra slots (Jewels first)
- New Runic Forging System allows for strengthing runewords by sacrificing runes
- Item Enhancement system for upgrading item stats in exchange for required level increases
- Item Forging system for creating new unique/set items from unwanted uniques/sets
- Storage Bag system that holds all your gems, runes, extra rare jewels, keys and organs
- Jewels and Charms can be re-rolled using gems directly from your storage bag
Item Types
- Many new class-specific items added:
- Many existing item types have been converted:
- Bows and Crossbows are now the same type (Bows)
- Arrows and Bolts are now the same type (Quivers)
- Spears and Polearms are now the same type (Spears)
- Quivers can now roll as any item quality and cost 1 gold
- Amazon Spears removed
- New Assassin weapon type has been added
- All Assassin Claws now have the chance for staff mods
Itemization
- Increased drop chance of higher runes
- Rune level requirements for low runes have been lowered
- Quivers, Tomes and Throwing Weapons have max quantity of 500 and replenish quantity
- Quivers can roll as any item quality
- Weapons now display itemtypes and true speed with the other basic info
- All relevant items show the item level next to the item name
- Increased Max Sockets for many items, and at lower levels
- +Experience% added to many low level uniques for faster leveling
Rune Changes
- New Runes        Di Rune        Ab Rune        Er Rune
Due to the increased socket counts, the following changes have been made:
- El (Weapon Attack Rating reduced from 50 to 30)
- Eld (Increases Faster Run/Walk by 5%)
- Ith (Max Damage reduced from 9 to 6)
- Tal/Ral/Ort/Thul (Resist% - Armor reduced from 30 to 10 and Shield from 35 to 20
- Tal/Ral/Ort/Thul (Elemental Damage reduced by 50%)
- Amn (Life Steal reduced from 7% to 5%)
- Sol (Damage Reduced By changed from 7 to 4)
- Shael (Increased Attack Speed reduced from 20% to 10%)
- Shael (Faster Hit Recovery reduced from 20% to 10%
- Dol (HP Regen reduced from 7 to 3)
- Pul (Att-Demon reduced from 100 to 50 and Dmg-Demon from 75% to 40%)
- Pul (Enhanced Defense% reduced from 30% to 20%)
- Um (All Resistance% reduced from 15% to 10%)
- Um (Open Wounds reduced from 25% to 10%)
- Mal (Magic Damage Reduced by lowered from 7 to 3)
- Ist (Weapon - Magic Find% reduced from 30% to 15%)
- Ist (Armor - Magic Find reduced from 25% to 10%)
- Gul (Attack Bonus% reduced from 20% to 15%)
- Vex (Mana Steal reduced from 7% to 5%)
- Ohm (Enhanced Damage% reduced from 50% to 35%)
- Lo (Deadly Strike reduced from 20% to 10%)
- Ber (Crushing Blow reduced from 20% to 10%)
- Jah (Max HP% reduced from 5 to 2)
- Cham (Freeze Target reduced from 3 to 2)
- Cham (Cannot be frozen to half freeze duration)
- Zod (Added 5% Cold, Lightning, Fire, Magic Absorb)
Forsaken Pacts
- Forsaken Pact Sets are special sets that can be created by sacrificing full sets
- Cube an entire set together to receive its Forsaken pact
- Cube multiple  Forsaken Pacts together to form a Forsaken Pact Set with all new items
- A list of Forsaken Pact recipes can be found in the Cube menu under Forsaken Pacts
- Forsaken Pact Sets can cost between two and three Forsaken Pacts
